name: kick-start

scripts.cucumber: node ./node_modules/@cucumber/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js tests/features/**/*.feature --require tests/world/custom-world.ts --require tests/step-definitions/**/*.ts --require-module ts-node/register --format-options "{\"snippetInterface\": \"async-await\"}" --format json:tests/reports/cucumber-report.json --format summary --format progress-bar
scripts.cucumber-check: node ./node_modules/@cucumber/cucumber/bin/cucumber-js tests/features/**/*.feature --require tests/world/custom-world.ts --require tests/step-definitions/**/*.ts --require-module ts-node/register --format-options "{\"snippetInterface\": \"async-await\"}"  --format summary --format progress-bar --dry-run

author: Keyrad Abbasi <keyrada@systemgroup.net>
description: This project kick starts a cucumber project
